full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffrey DATE 01/20/05 TIME 5:00 P.M. M OF PHONE/MOBILE 917 330 TELEPHONED RETURNED YOUR CALL MESSAGE Wishing you a Happy Bday SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR DOJ REDACTION DATE DOJ REDACTION TIME 11:20 A.M. additional_notes: The document contains four 'Important Message' forms with handwritten notes. Three of the forms have names or messages redacted by the Department of Justice (DOJ). The document is stamped as 'GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 3-T-R' with a reference number.
